description:
**Your Python Multi-tool**: *Four built-ins and a module*

There are four built-in functions and a module that makeup a "Python
Multi-tool".

help, dir, type, id, and inspect

Whether you are new to Python or have years of experience, these five
tools are very helpful when learning something new in the language. Easy
to use and often overlooked for use by tutorials, these are powerful
allies that will be (re)introduced to you in this talk.
title: Your Python Multi-Tool: Four Built-Ins and a Module
